title: YES Rich Medium
original description: Similar to YPD Medium for budding yeast, YES Medium is the rich growth medium utilized for fission yeast.
steps:
Mixing
1. Add 5.0 g Yeast Extract to a 1 Liter Erlenmeyer Flask. 
5amount 
reagents
2. Add 30 g Glucose or Dextrose to the flask. 
30amount 
reagents
3. Add 0.25 g Adenine to the flask. 
0amount 
reagents
4. Add 0.25 g Uracil to the flask. 
0amount 
reagents
5. Add 0.25 g Histidine to the flask. 
0amount 
reagents
6. Add 0.25 Leucine to the flask. 
0amount 
reagents
7. Add 0.25 g Lysine to the flask. 
0amount 
reagents
8. Add 1 g Arginine to the flask. 
1amount 
reagents
9. Optional: For solid medium add 20 g Difco Bacto Agar to the flask. 
20amount 
reagents
10. Fill the flask with water up to the 1 Liter mark on the flask. 
1amount
11. Place a magnetic stir bar into the flask and place the flask on a magnetic stirrer to dissolve the powder into the water. 
600s
12. Remove the stir bar with a magnetic rod.

Autoclaving
13. Place aluminum foil over the top of the flask and then autoclave on a liquid cycle for 20 minutes. 
3600s
14. If solid medium, pour while still hot into plates and let them sit out to cool overnight on the lab bench.
If liquid medium, aliquot into smaller amounts and store at + 4 C.  
NOTES Solid medium must be poured while still hot, otherwise it can solidify inside the flask. 
NOTES Storing liquid medium in small aliquots helps prevent against widespread contamination through normal use. 
NOTES After solid medium-filled plates cool, store inverted at +4 C.
ai_generated_description: This protocol outlines the steps to prepare YES Rich Medium, a growth medium used for fission yeast in molecular biology experiments. The objective is to mix and autoclave the necessary components, creating a liquid or solid medium suitable for yeast growth and storage.

# Protocol steps
flask = "1 Liter Erlenmeyer Flask"
add_reagent(flask, "Yeast Extract", 5.0)
add_reagent(flask, "Glucose or Dextrose", 30)
add_reagent(flask, "Adenine", 0.25)
add_reagent(flask, "Uracil", 0.25)
add_reagent(flask, "Histidine", 0.25)
add_reagent(flask, "Leucine", 0.25)
add_reagent(flask, "Lysine", 0.25)
add_reagent(flask, "Arginine", 1)
add_reagent(flask, "Difco Bacto Agar", 20, optional=True)  # Optional step for solid medium
add_water(flask, 1)
dissolve_powder(flask, stir_time=600)
remove_stir_bar(flask)
autoclave(flask, autoclave_cycle="liquid", time=3600)

# Choose either solid or liquid medium preparation
if preparing_solid_medium:
    prepare_solid_medium(flask)  # For solid medium
    cool_solid_medium(flask, cooling_time="overnight")
    store_solid_medium(flask, storage_temp=4, inverted=True)
else:
    prepare_liquid_medium(flask, aliquot_volume="smaller amounts", storage_temp=4)  # For liquid medium
# end of protocol
